title: Operations Report
description: Information about a series of drilling activities.

StartDateTime.title: Start Date Time
StartDateTime.description: Date and time that the reporting period started. A report period is commonly 24 hours.

EndDateTime.title: End Date Time
EndDateTime.description: Date and time that the reporting period ended. A report period is commonly 24 hours.

items.title: BitRecord
items.description: Information on the condition of the Drill Bit as recorded during an operations report

NumBit.title: Identifier
NumBit.description: Bit number and rerun number e.g. "4.1" for the first rerun of bit 4.

DiameterPassThrough.title: Authority
DiameterPassThrough.description: Minimum hole or tubing which bit will pass through (for bi-center bits).

DiameterPilot.title: Pilot Diameter
DiameterPilot.description: Diameter of pilot bit (for bi-center bits).

CostCurrency.title: Cost Currency
CostCurrency.description: The name of the local currency

MfgCode.title: Manufacturer Code
MfgCode.description: The manufacturers code for the bit.

InitialConditionInner.title: Initial Inner Condition
InitialConditionInner.description: Condition of inner tooth rows (inner 2/3 of bit) (0-8).

InitialConditionOuter.title: Initial Outer Condition
InitialConditionOuter.description: Condition of outer tooth rows (outer 1/3 of bit) (0-8).

InitialConditionDull.title: Initial Dull Condition
InitialConditionDull.description: Overall dull condition from IADC bit wear 2 character codes.

InitialConditionLocation.title: Initial Condition Location
InitialConditionLocation.description: Row and cone numbers for items which need location information (e.g. Cracked Cone, Lost Cone etc).

InitialConditionBearing.title: Initial Condition Bearing
InitialConditionBearing.description: Condition of bit bearings (integer 0-8 or E, F, N or X)).

InitialConditionGauge.title: Initial Condition Gauge
InitialConditionGauge.description: Condition of bit gauge in 1/16 of an inch. I = in gauge, else number of 16ths out of gauge.

InitialConditionOther.title: Initial Condition Other
InitialConditionOther.description: Other comments on bit condition from IADC list (BitDullCode in standard list).

InitialConditionReason.title: Initial Condition Reason
InitialConditionReason.description: Reason bit was pulled from IADC codes.

FinalConditionInner.title: Final Condition Inner
FinalConditionInner.description: Condition of inner tooth rows (inner 2/3 of bit) (0-8).

FinalConditionOuter.title: Final Condition Outer
FinalConditionOuter.description: Condition of outer tooth rows (outer 1/3 of bit) (0-8).

FinalConditionDull.title: Final Condition Dull
FinalConditionDull.description: Overall dull condition from IADC bit wear 2 character codes.

FinalConditionLocation.title: Final Condition Location
FinalConditionLocation.description: Row and cone numbers for items which need location information (e.g. Cracked Cone, Lost Cone etc).

FinalConditionBearing.title: Final Condition Bearing
FinalConditionBearing.description: Condition of bit bearings (integer 0-8 or E, F, N or X).

FinalConditionGauge.title: Final Condition Gauge
FinalConditionGauge.description: Condition of bit gauge in 1/16 of a inch. I = in gauge, else number of 16ths out of gauge.

FinalConditionOther.title: Final Condition Other
FinalConditionOther.description: Other comments on bit condition from IADC list (BitDullCode in Standard LISTS).

FinalConditionReason.title: Final Condition Reason
FinalConditionReason.description: Reason bit was pulled from IADC codes.

DriveType.title: Drive Type
DriveType.description: Bit drive type (Motor, rotary table etc).

DrillActivity.title: Drill Activity
DrillActivity.description: An Array of drilling activities performed during this reporting period.

items.title: Drilling Activity
items.description: Information regarding an individual activity that is part of the Drilling Report

StartDateTime.title: Start Date Time
StartDateTime.description: Date and time that activities started.

EndDateTime.title: End Date Time
EndDateTime.description: Date and time that activities ended.

MeasuredDepth.title: Measured Depth
MeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth to the drilling activity/operation.

TVD.title: TVD
TVD.description: True vertical depth to the drilling activity/operation.

Phase.title: Phase
Phase.description: Phase refers to a large activity classification, e.g., drill surface hole.

ActivityCodeID.title: Activity Code
ActivityCodeID.description: The activity code of the activity

DetailActivity.title: Detail Activity
DetailActivity.description: Custom string to further define an activity.

ActivityMDTop.title: Activity MD Top
ActivityMDTop.description: Measured depth at the top of interval over which the activity was conducted.

ActivityMDBase.title: Activity MD Base
ActivityMDBase.description: Measured depth at the base of interval over which the activity was conducted.

ActivityTVDTop.title: Activity TVD Top
ActivityTVDTop.description: TVD at the top of interval over which the activity was conducted.

ActivityTVDBase.title: Activity TVD Base
ActivityTVDBase.description: TVD at the base of interval over which the activity was conducted.

BitMDTop.title: Bit MD Top
BitMDTop.description: Measured depth of the bit at the top of interval over which the activity was conducted.

BitMDBase.title: Bit MD Base
BitMDBase.description: Measured depth of the bit at the ase of interval over which the activity was conducted.

ActivityOutcomeDetailID.title: Activity Outcome Detail
ActivityOutcomeDetailID.description: More detail on the outcome of the activity. For Example Injury, Operation Failed, Kick, Circulation Loss, Mud Loss

OperatorID.title: Operator ID
OperatorID.description: Reference to the Organisation that represents the Operator

ServiceProviderID.title: Service Provider ID
ServiceProviderID.description: Reference to the Organisation that represents the Service Provider

TubularID.title: Tubular ID
TubularID.description: A pointer to the tubular object related to this activity. Not the Hole Section that you are operating within.

IsOptimum.title: Is Optimum
IsOptimum.description: Is the activity optimum? Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

IsProductive.title: Is Productive
IsProductive.description: Does activity bring closer to objective?  Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

IsOffline.title: Is Offline
IsOffline.description: Is the activity an Offline activity, Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

ItemState.title: Item State
ItemState.description: The item state for the data object. (Actual, Planned, Unknown and Modeled)

ProprietaryActivityCode.title: Proprietary Activity Code
ProprietaryActivityCode.description: Alternate proprietary activity code. For example contractor specific activity code

ParentID.title: Parent ID
ParentID.description: The UID of the parent activity

PredecessorID.title: Predecessor ID
PredecessorID.description: The UID of the preceding activity

PlannedHoleDepthIn.title: Planned Hole Depth In
PlannedHoleDepthIn.description: The planned hole depth at the start of the activity

PlannedHoleDepthOut.title: Planned Hole Depth Out
PlannedHoleDepthOut.description: The planned hole depth at the end of the activity

PlannedDuration.title: Planned Duration
PlannedDuration.description: The planned duration for the activity.

TargetDepth.title: Target Depth
TargetDepth.description: The target depth of the activity

SectionDiameter.title: Section Diameter
SectionDiameter.description: The Diameter of the section in which the activity took place

ObjectReference.title: Object Reference
ObjectReference.description: link to an external object or document. For example Regulatory submission, Tour sheet.

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: A link to the wellbore in which these activities took place

WellAlias.title: Well Alias
WellAlias.description: Local name defined for the Well

WellboreAlias.title: Wellbore Alias
WellboreAlias.description: Local name defined for the wellbore

StatusInfo.title: Status Info
StatusInfo.description: Information regarding the status of the wellbore during this reporting period

items.title: DrillingReportStatusInfo
items.description: Status information related to a Drilling Report

StatusDateTime.title: Status Date Time
StatusDateTime.description: The date and time for which the well status is reported.

ReportEndMD.title: Report End MD
ReportEndMD.description: Wellbore measured depth at the end of the report period.

ReportEndTVD.title: Report End TVD
ReportEndTVD.description: Wellbore true vertical depth at the end of the report.

DiameterHoleStartMD.title: Diameter Hole Start MD
DiameterHoleStartMD.description: Measured depth to the start of the current hole diameter.

DiameterPilotPlanMD.title: Pilot Diameter Plan MD
DiameterPilotPlanMD.description: The planned measured depth of the pilot hole.

DiameterPilotPlanTVD.title: Pilot Diameter Plan TVD
DiameterPilotPlanTVD.description: The planned true vertical depth of the pilot hole.

KickoffMD.title: Kickoff MD
KickoffMD.description: Measured depth to the kickoff point of the wellbore.

KickoffTVD.title: Kickoff TVD
KickoffTVD.description: True vertical depth to the kickoff point of the wellbore.

FormationStrength.title: Formation Strength
FormationStrength.description: The measured formation strength. This should be the final measurement before the end of the report period.

FormationStrengthMD.title: Formation Strength MD
FormationStrengthMD.description: The measured depth of the formation strength measurement.

FormationStrengthTVD.title: Formation Strength TVD
FormationStrengthTVD.description: The true vertical depth of the formation strength measurement.

CasingDiameterLast.title: Last Casing Diameter
CasingDiameterLast.description: Diameter of the last casing joint.

CasingMDLast.title: Last Casing MD
CasingMDLast.description: Measured depth of the last casing joint.

CasingTVDLast.title: Last Casing TVD
CasingTVDLast.description: True vertical depth of last casing joint.

PresTestType.title: Pressure Test Type
PresTestType.description: The type of pressure test that was run.

MdPlanned.title: Planned MD
MdPlanned.description: The measured depth planned to be reached.

DrilledDistance.title: Drilled Distance
DrilledDistance.description: Distance drilled.  This should be measured along the centerline of the wellbore.

Summary24Hr.title: 24Hr Summary
Summary24Hr.description: A summary of the activities performed and the status of the ongoing activities.

Forecast24Hr.title: 24Hr Forecast
Forecast24Hr.description: A summary of  planned activities for the next reporting period.

RopCurrent.title: Current ROP
RopCurrent.description: Rate of penetration at the end of the reporting period.

Rig.title: Rig
Rig.description: A pointer to the rig used.

ElapsedTimeStart.title: Elapsed Start Time
ElapsedTimeStart.description: Time from the start of operations (commonly in days).

ElapsedTimeSpud.title: Elapsed Spud Time
ElapsedTimeSpud.description: Time since the bit broke ground (commonly in days).

ElapsedTimeLoc.title: Elapsed Time Location
ElapsedTimeLoc.description: Time the rig has been on location (commonly in days).

Engineer.title: Engineer
Engineer.description: Name of the operator's drilling engineer.

ElapsedTimeDrillSlid.title: Elapsed Time Sliding Drilling
ElapsedTimeDrillSlid.description: Time spent slide drilling from the start of the bit run.

ElapsedTimeCirc.title: Elapsed Time Circulating
ElapsedTimeCirc.description: Time spent circulating from the start of the bit run.

ElapsedTimeReam.title: Elapsed Time Reaming
ElapsedTimeReam.description: Time spent reaming from the start of the bit run.

ElapsedTimeHold.title: Relapsed Time Holding
ElapsedTimeHold.description: Time spent with no directional drilling work (commonly in hours).

ElapsedTimeSteering.title: Elapsed Time Steering
ElapsedTimeSteering.description: Time spent steering the bottomhole assembly (commonly in hours).

DistHold.title: Drilled Distance Holding Angle
DistHold.description: Distance covered while holding angle with a steerable drilling assembly.

DistSteering.title: Drilled Distance Steering
DistSteering.description: Distance covered while actively steering with a steerable drilling assembly.

NumPOB.title: Number POB
NumPOB.description: Total number of personnel on board the rig.

NumContract.title: Number of contractors
NumContract.description: Number of contractor personnel on the rig.

NumOperator.title: Number of operator personnel
NumOperator.description: Number of operator personnel on the rig.

NumService.title: Number of Service Personnel
NumService.description: Number of service company personnel on the rig.

NumAFE.title: AFE number
NumAFE.description: Authorization for expenditure (AFE) number that this cost item applies to.

TvdLot.title: LOT TVD
TvdLot.description: True vertical depth of a leak off test point.

PresLotEmw.title: Pressure LOT EMW
PresLotEmw.description: Leak off test equivalent mud weight.

Tubular.title: Tubular
Tubular.description: A pointer to the tubular (assembly) used in this report period.

CostDayMud.title: Daily Mud Cost
CostDayMud.description: The cost per day of the mud used

FluidsIDs.title: Fluid IDs
FluidsIDs.description: References to the Fluids Reports generated during this reporting period.

PorePressure.title: Pore Pressure
PorePressure.description: A reference to the PPFG information for this reporting period

TimedComments.title: TimedComments
TimedComments.description: A series of time stamped comments which comprise part of this operations report.

items.title: Timed Comment
items.description: Information about a series of drilling activities.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A comment that has been recorded at a particular time

CommentTime.title: Comment Time
CommentTime.description: The time that the comment was made

CustomerId.title: Customer ID
CustomerId.description: Reference to the Organisation that represents the Customer

StewardingCompanyID.title: Stewarding Company ID
StewardingCompanyID.description: Reference to the Organisation that represents the Stewarding Company

StewardingCompanyTeamID.title: Stewarding Company Team ID
StewardingCompanyTeamID.description: Reference to the Organisation that represents the Stewarding Company Team

Weather.title: Weather
Weather.description: Meteorological readings for the defined time period on an operations report

items.title: Weather
items.description: Meteorological readings for the defined time period on an operations report

Agency.title: Agency
Agency.description: Name of company that supplied the weather data.

WaveDirection.title: Wave Direction
WaveDirection.description: The direction from which the waves are coming, measured from true north.

WindDirection.title: Wind Direction
WindDirection.description: The direction from which the wind is blowing, measured from true north.

BeaufortScaleNumber.title: Beaufort Scale Number
BeaufortScaleNumber.description: The Beaufort wind force scale is a system used to estimate and report wind speeds when no measuring apparatus is available. It was invented in the early 19th century by Admiral Sir Francis Beaufort of the British Navy as a way to interpret winds from conditions. Values range from 0 (calm) to 12 (hurricane force).

CurrentSeaSpeed.title: Current Sea Speed
CurrentSeaSpeed.description: The speed of the ocean current.

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Date and time that weather was observed

WaveHeightAverage.title: Wave Height Average
WaveHeightAverage.description: Average height of the sea waves.

WavePeriod.title: Wave Period
WavePeriod.description: The elapsed time between the passing of two wave tops.

WaveSignificant.title: Wave Significant
WaveSignificant.description: An average of the higher 1/3 of the wave heights passing during a sample period (typically 20 to 30 minutes).

SurfaceTempMin.title: Surface Temperature Minimum
SurfaceTempMin.description: Minimum temperature above ground. Temperature of the atmosphere.

WindChillTemp.title: Wind Chill Temperature
WindChillTemp.description: A measure of the combined chilling effect of wind and low temperature on living things, also named chill factor, e.g., according to the US weather service table, an air temperature of 30 degF with a 10 mph corresponds to a windchill of 22 degF.

Personnel.title: Personnel
Personnel.description: Snapshot of operations personnel broken down by each company on the rig at the time of the report.

items.title: Personnel
items.description: Snapshot of operations personnel broken down by each company on the rig at the time of the report.

OrganizationID.title: Organization ID
OrganizationID.description: A Reference to the organization for which have their headcount measured during this report

HeadCount.title: Head Count
HeadCount.description: Number of people on board for that company.

TotalTime.title: Total Time
TotalTime.description: Total time worked by the company (commonly in hours).

OrganizationRole.title: Organization Role
OrganizationRole.description: Role the organization is playing for the service being provided

PumpOp.title: Pump Operations
PumpOp.description: Information related to pump operations on a drilling/operations report

items.title: Pump Operations
items.description: Information related to pump operations on a drilling/operations report

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Date and time when the pump operation occurred

MeasuredDepthBit.title: Bit Measure Depth
MeasuredDepthBit.description: Along-hole measured depth of the measurement from the drill datum.

PumpNumber.title: Pump Number
PumpNumber.description: The sequence number of the pump (e.g., pump 1)

PumpDisplacement.title: Pump Displacement
PumpDisplacement.description: how much fluid is moved by the pump in one cycle

PumpModelName.title: Pump Model Name
PumpModelName.description: The model name for the pump

MudVolume.title: Mud Volume
MudVolume.description: Information related to mud volumes for drilling/operations report

items.title: MudVolume
items.description: Information related to mud volumes for drilling/operations report

MudVolumeStart.title: Mud Volume Start
MudVolumeStart.description: Volume of mud at start of report interval (including pits and hole).

MudVolumeEnd.title: Mud Volume End
MudVolumeEnd.description: Volume of mud at the end of the report interval (including pits and hole).

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Date and time of the mud volume

MudVolumeMeasureDepthTop.title: Mud Volume Measure Depth Top
MudVolumeMeasureDepthTop.description: Top measured depth for which the mud volume reading was conducted

MudVolumeMeasureDepthBase.title: Mud Volume Measure Depth Base
MudVolumeMeasureDepthBase.description: Bottom measured depth for which the mud volume reading was conducted

MudVolumeTvdTop.title: Mud Volume TVD Top
MudVolumeTvdTop.description: Top  true vertical depth interval over which the mud volume reading was conducted.

MudVolumeTvdBase.title: Mud Volume TVD Base
MudVolumeTvdBase.description: Bottom true vertical depth interval over which the mud volume reading was conducted.

MudVolumeCasing.title: Mud Volume Casing
MudVolumeCasing.description: Volume of mud contained in casing annulus.

MudVolumeHole.title: Mud Volume Hole
MudVolumeHole.description: Volume of mud contained in the openhole annulus.

MudVolumeReceived.title: Mud Volume Received
MudVolumeReceived.description: Volume of mud received from mud warehouse.

MudVolumeReturned.title: Mud Volume Returned
MudVolumeReturned.description: Volume of mud returned to mud warehouse.

MudVolumeRiser.title: Mud Volume Riser
MudVolumeRiser.description: Volume of mud contained in riser section annulus.

MudVolumeString.title: Mud Volume String
MudVolumeString.description: Volume of mud contained within active string.

TotalMudVolume.title: Total Mud Volume
TotalMudVolume.description: Actual total mud volume that was measured

ExpectedMudVolume.title: Expected Mud Volume
ExpectedMudVolume.description: Total mud volume that was expected

Inventory.title: Inventory
Inventory.description: Quantity of items inventoried during drilling and/or operations

items.title: Inventory
items.description: Quantity of items inventoried during drilling and/or operations

CostItem.title: Item Cost
CostItem.description: Cost for the product for the report interval.

ItemName.title: Item Name
ItemName.description: Name or type of inventory item.

PricePerUnit.title: Item Price Per Unit
PricePerUnit.description: Price per item unit, assume same currency for all items.

TotalQuantityOnLocation.title: Total Quantity on Location
TotalQuantityOnLocation.description: Amount of the item remaining on location after all adjustments for the report interval.

TotalQuantityReturned.title: Total Quantity Returned
TotalQuantityReturned.description: Quantity returned to base from site.

TotalQuantityUsed.title: Total Quantity Used
TotalQuantityUsed.description: Quantity used for the report interval.

Cost.title: Cost
Cost.description: Cost information captured for a defined time period during operations and/or drilling

items.title: Cost
items.description: Cost information captured for a defined time period during operations and/or drilling

TotalCostAmount.title: Total Cost Amount
TotalCostAmount.description: Total cost for the item for this period

UnitCost.title: Unit Cost
UnitCost.description: Cost per item, assume same currency.

IsCarryOver.title: Carry Over Flag
IsCarryOver.description: Is this item carried from day to day?

UnitKind.title: Unit Kind
UnitKind.description: The kind of cost item specified (e.g., barrel, sack, gallon)

TagName.title: Item Identification Tag
TagName.description: An identification tag for the item. A serial number is a type of identification tag; however, some tags contain many pieces of information. This element only identifies the tag and does not describe the contents.

AFENumber.title: AFE Number
AFENumber.description: AFE number that this cost item applies to.

InvoiceNumber.title: Invoice Number
InvoiceNumber.description: Invoice number for cost item; the bill is sent to the operator.

PONumber.title: Purchase Order Number
PONumber.description: Purchase order number provided by the operator.

TicketNumber.title: Ticket Number
TicketNumber.description: The field ticket number issued by the service company on location.

CostPoolName.title: Cost Pool Name
CostPoolName.description: Name of pool/reservoir that this cost item can be accounted to.

TotalQuantityItemsUsed.title: Total Quantity Items Used
TotalQuantityItemsUsed.description: Number of cost items used that day, e.g., 1 rig dayrate, 30 joints of casing.

ActivityPhaseID.title: Activity Phase
ActivityPhaseID.description: Activity code classification describing higher level steps in the Well Activity

InUse.title: In Use
InUse.description: Used to indicate if Equipment or Service in scope for the Cost Item is being used. Can drive different Standby/In Use Rental Rates where applicable.

HSE.title: HSE
HSE.description: Health Safety or Environment events that occurred since the last drilling/operation report. Captures data related to HSE events (e.g., tests, inspections, meetings, and drills), test values (e.g., pressure tested to), and/or incidents (e.g., discharges, non-compliance notices received, etc.).

items.title: Health Safety Environment
items.description: Health Safety or Environment events that occurred since the last drilling/operation report. Captures data related to HSE events (e.g., tests, inspections, meetings, and drills), test values (e.g., pressure tested to), and/or incidents (e.g., discharges, non-compliance notices received, etc.).

LastBopPressureTestDate.title: Last BOP Pressure Test Date
LastBopPressureTestDate.description: Last blow out preventer pressure test.

LastCasingPressureTestDate.title: Last Casing Pressure Test Date
LastCasingPressureTestDate.description: Last casing pressure test date and time.

LastFireBoatDrillDate.title: Last Fire Boat Drill Date
LastFireBoatDrillDate.description: Last fire or life boat drill.

NextBopPresTestDate.title: Next BOP Pressure Test Date
NextBopPresTestDate.description: Next blow out preventer pressure test.

TotalStopCards.title: Total Stop Cards
TotalStopCards.description: Number of health, safety and environment incidents reported.

PressureAnnular.title: Pressure Annular
PressureAnnular.description: Blow out preventer annular preventer pressure tested to.

PressureChokeMan.title: Pressure Choke Man
PressureChokeMan.description: Choke line manifold pressure tested to.

PressureDiverter.title: Pressure Diverter
PressureDiverter.description: Blow out preventer diverter pressure tested to.

PressureBOPRam.title: Pressure BOP Ram
PressureBOPRam.description: Blow out preventer ram pressure tested to.

Incident.title: Incident
Incident.description: Description of incidents that have occurred during the last drilling/operations report

items.title: Incident
items.description: Description of incidents that have occurred during the last drilling/operations report

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Date and time that incident occurred

CostLossEstimate.title: Cost Loss Estimate
CostLossEstimate.description: Gross estimate of the cost incurred due to the incident.

EstimateHoursLost.title: Estimate Hours Lost
EstimateHoursLost.description: Number of hours lost due to the incident.

TotalFatality.title: Total Fatalities
TotalFatality.description: Number of personnel killed due to the incident.

TotalMajorInjury.title: Total Major Injuries
TotalMajorInjury.description: Number of personnel with major injuries.

TotalMinorInjury.title: Total Minor Injuries
TotalMinorInjury.description: Number of personnel with minor injuries.

IncidentReporterName.title: Incident Reporter Name
IncidentReporterName.description: Name of the person who prepared the incident report.

OrganisationID.title: Organisation ID
OrganisationID.description: A reference to the organisation for which is the company primarily involved in managing the incident.

MudLosses.title: Mud Losses
MudLosses.description: Mud that has been lost during drilling / operations

items.title: Mud Losses
items.description: Mud that has been lost during drilling / operations

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Date and time that the mud loss occurred

MudLostVolumeMeasureDepthTop.title: Mud Lost Measure Depth Top
MudLostVolumeMeasureDepthTop.description: Top measured depth for which the mud loss reading was occurred

MudLostVolumeMeasureDepthBase.title: Mud Lost Measure Depth Base
MudLostVolumeMeasureDepthBase.description: Bottom measured depth for which the mud loss reading was occurred

MudLostVolumeTvdTop.title: Mud Lost TVD Top
MudLostVolumeTvdTop.description: Top  true vertical depth interval over which the mud loss reading was occurred

MudLostVolumeTvdBase.title: Mud Lost TVD Base
MudLostVolumeTvdBase.description: Bottom true vertical depth interval over which the mud loss reading was occurred

MudLostVolumeAbandonDownhole.title: Mud Lost Volume Abandon Downhole
MudLostVolumeAbandonDownhole.description: Mud volume lost downhole during abandonment.

MudLostVolumeBehindCasingDownhole.title: Mud Lost Volume Behind Casing Downhole
MudLostVolumeBehindCasingDownhole.description: Mud volume lost downhole behind casing.

MudLostVolumeCirculatingDownhole.title: Mud Lost Volume Circulating Downhole
MudLostVolumeCirculatingDownhole.description: Mud volume lost downhole while circulating.

MudLostVolumeCementingDownhole.title: Mud Lost Volume Cementing Downhole
MudLostVolumeCementingDownhole.description: Mud volume lost downhole while cementing.

MudLostVolumeCasingHole.title: Mud Lost Volume Casing Hole
MudLostVolumeCasingHole.description: Mud volume lost at the time of the report. Captures volumes of mud lost for specific activities or onsite locations and total volumes for surface and down hole.

MudLostVolumeMudCleanerSurface.title: Mud Lost Volume Cleaner Surface
MudLostVolumeMudCleanerSurface.description: Volume of mud lost in mud cleaning equipment (at surface).

MudLostVolumeOtherLocationDownhole.title: Mud Lost Volume Other Location Downhole
MudLostVolumeOtherLocationDownhole.description: Mud volume lost downhole from other location.

MudLostVolumeOtherLocationSurface.title: Mud Lost Volume Other Location Surface

MudLostVolumePitsSurface.title: Mud Lost Volume Surface
MudLostVolumePitsSurface.description: Volume of mud lost in pit room (at surface).

MudLostVolumeShakerSurface.title: Mud Lost Volume Shaker Surface
MudLostVolumeShakerSurface.description: Volume of mud lost at shakers (at surface).

MudLostVolumeTrippingSurface.title: Mud Lost Volume Tripping Surface
MudLostVolumeTrippingSurface.description: Volume of mud lost while tripping (at surface).

TotalMudLostVolumeDownhole.title: Total Mud Lost Volume Downhole
TotalMudLostVolumeDownhole.description: Total volume of mud lost downhole.

TotalMudLostVolumeSurface.title: Total Mud Lost Volume Surface
TotalMudLostVolumeSurface.description: Total volume of mud lost at surface.

JobContact.title: JobContact
JobContact.description: Operator personnel contact information on an operations report

GasReading.title: GasReading
GasReading.description: General information about a gas reading taken during the drill report period

items.title: GasReading
items.description: General information about a gas reading taken during the drill report period

DateTime.title: Datetime
DateTime.description: Date and time of the gas reading.

GasReadingMeasureDepthTop.title: Gas Reading Measure Depth Top
GasReadingMeasureDepthTop.description: Top measured depth for which the gas reading was conducted

GasReadingTvdBase.title: Gas Reading TVD Base
GasReadingTvdBase.description: Bottom true vertical depth interval over which the gas reading was conducted.

ReadingType.title: Reading Type
ReadingType.description: Type of gas reading, e.g.circulating, background gas, connection gas, drilling background, gas, drilling gas peak, flow check gas, no readings, other, shut down gas, trip gas, unknown.

Forecast24Hr.title: Next 24hr Activity Forecast
Forecast24Hr.description: Forecast of activities for the next 24 hrs.

Lithology.title: Lithology Description
Lithology.description: Description of the lithology for the interval.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Individual, company, or corporate division that work is being executed on behalf of

StewardingCompany.title: Stewarding Company
StewardingCompany.description: Company or corporate division that is responsible for executing the work

StewardingCompanyTeam.title: Stewarding Company Team
StewardingCompanyTeam.description: Team within a company or corporate division that is responsible for executing the work

TotalCost.title: Total Cost
TotalCost.description: Cumulative cost for the job through the end of current report

TargetCost.title: Target Cost
TargetCost.description: Authorized cost for the total job

TargetDays.title: Target Days
TargetDays.description: Planned days for the total job

TotalDays.title: Total Days
TotalDays.description: Cumulative days for the job through the end of the current report

TotalNPT.title: Total Non-Productive Time
TotalNPT.description: Total days of non-productive time through the end of the current report
